## Setup

library(tidyverse)

## Problem 1
```{r}
plot_gss_sm_male <- gss_sm |> filter(obama == 1, sex=='Male') |> group_by(polviews, sex) |> summarize(count = n()) |> ungroup() |> mutate(percentage= count/sum(count))
plot_gss_sm_female <- gss_sm |> filter(obama == 1, sex=='Female') |> group_by(polviews, sex) |> summarize(count = n()) |> ungroup() |> mutate(percentage= count/sum(count))
plot_gss_sm <- rbind(plot_gss_sm_male, plot_gss_sm_female)
plot <- ggplot(plot_gss_sm, mapping=aes(x=percentage, y=polviews, group=sex, fill=sex))
plot  + geom_col(aes(group=sex)) +
        facet_wrap(~sex)
```
